description:
Being blackmailed by Ozu, Nao attempts to trap Kirishima so that the thugs he recently viciously beat up to the point of hospitalization can take revenge on him. Yoshino uncovers the entire scheme and approaches Ozu on her own initiative.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: En vrai, je veux t`épouser (1re partie)
Honne o Ieba Kekkon Shitai: Zenpen
To Be Honest, I Want to Marry You, Part One
本音を言えば結婚したい 前編
